alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:20PM EST until February 24 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mixed precipitation expected of freezing rain, snow and sleet. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Litchfield County northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing drizzle will become periods of freezing rain mixed with some sleet tonight before changing to snow and some rain showers south of the Mass Pike. The precipitation will end in the early morning hours with scattered flurries.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
